[david-url]: https://david-dm.org/node-modules/humanize-ms

transform humanize time to ms

## Installation

```bash
$ npm install humanize-ms
```

## Examples

```js
var ms = require('humanize-ms');

ms('1s') // 1000
ms(1000) // 1000
```
